info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 24 at 4:23PM PDT until August 24 at 6:45PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southern Nevada, including the following county, Clark. * WHEN...Until 615 PM PDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 422 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 0.25 and 0.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Las Vegas, Henderson, North Las Vegas, Spring Valley, The Strip, Enterprise, Paradise, Mountains Edge, Southern Highlands, Summerlin, Green Valley, East Las Vegas, Harry Reid International Airport, North Las Vegas Airport, Stratosphere Tower, The Lakes and Unlv. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
